pr_title: HDDS-2999. Move server-related shared utilities from common to framework

timeline.message: HDDS-2999. Move server-related shared utilities from common to framework
move back the config key but not the default profile

timeline.bodyText: Is this removed intentionally?  The methods being tested are still present in RatisHelper.
